summary:
Windows 10 is an operating system made by Microsoft. It was released in 2015 as an upgrade to Windows 8.1. The new version had a more traditional look, unlike the tablet-style design of Windows 8. It offered improvements to the software and a new web browser called Microsoft Edge.

Windows 10 became very popular and was used on over one billion devices. It had some issues, like privacy concerns and forced updates. Microsoft stopped supporting it in 2025, and many users switched to the newer Windows 11.
title: Windows 10
